rooms.name: room1
rooms.description:
Welcome young trainer, this is the starting point of your journey. Feel free to look around and explore the map. Observe the space. 
 This is room 1

characters.name: Pat
characters.description: He might with a decent probability catch them all

rooms.name: room2
rooms.description:
Woah, there are some dudes here. Why don't you check them out? 
 This is room 2

characters.name: Joe
characters.description: He's sadly not gonna catch them all

rooms.name: room3
rooms.description:
There seems to be a pokemon center over there! Remember that when you need to heal your pokemon. 
 This is room 3

rooms.name: room4
rooms.description:
Approach carefully, this is the training space of one of the elite trainers of this map. 
 This is room 4

characters.name: Ken
characters.description: Get ready to face the third strongest trainer

rooms.name: room5
rooms.description:
You have entered the garden, Aidan likes to hangout here with his pokemon. He is an elite trainer. 
 This is room 5

characters.name: Aidan
characters.description: Get ready to face the second strongest trainer

rooms.name: room6
rooms.description:
'Welcome', you hear a voice say from behind the bushes... Observe and you may find another elite trainer. 
 This is room 6

characters.name: Julia
characters.description: Get ready to face the strongest trainer

description: Welcome to the Kanto Pokemon Region
